name: heartmula-web
description: HeartMuLa Web UI - AI Music Generation

scripts.dev: concurrently --names backend,frontend --prefix-colors cyan,magenta "bun run dev:backend" "bun run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: cd .. && conda run -n heartmula --no-capture-output python -m uvicorn web.backend.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --timeout-keep-alive 600 --no-access-log --reload-exclude ckpt --reload-exclude .cache --reload-exclude output --reload-exclude __pycache__ --reload-exclude node_modules
scripts.start: concurrently --names backend,frontend --prefix-colors cyan,magenta "bun run start:backend" "bun run serve:frontend"
scripts.start:backend: cd .. && conda run -n heartmula --no-capture-output python -m uvicorn web.backend.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.install:all: bun run install:frontend && bun run install:backend
scripts.setup: bun run install:all && bun run check:models
